Its time to get this Tory government out their policies are going back to the victorian era especially trying to get young people to work for nothing whats next bring back work houses. Cameron is nothing but a PR man looking after bankers and big business exactly what happened in Victorian times, also they are copying Reagans policies in America that devastated  small towns and communities. So please get this petition started and get these millionares and tax avoidence people out

Thank You
